Text.Page:
Isobel is asking for assistance in the Timeless Woods. She's not known for her patience, so haste is the best advice we can offer you.

Safe journey to you.

Took them long enough to send someone! Blast! Do they think I was asking for the fun of it?

We'll talk about the chain of command later. Right now I need you to get up to the northern path and get rid of the {@LinkCreature:29#1021#inky sabertooths} and {@LinkCreature:29#1031#inky sabertooth alphas} that have been blocking our supply route.

Bring back the fangs. I have plans for them.

Well, late or not, it's nice to see a competent soldier. Not another brainless keener or some parchment commando.

For all the beauty in this region, there's a lot of danger but my superiors just won't listen. I don't want my troops dead because we're just "watching the woods."
Hey, you've got your orders. I want that supply route cleared immediately, or I'll have your guts for garters!
